mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rm,human.* from (select free_num, id, free_title, free_date, free_hit from f_board order by free_num)human) where rm between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select free_Num, free_Title, free_Content from f_board where free_Num=#{free_Num}
mapper.update: update f_board set free_Title=#{free_Title}, free_Content=#{free_Content} where free_Num=#{free_Num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from free_comments where free_Num=#{free_Num}
mapper.update: update f_board set free_Hit=free_Hit+1 where free_Num=#{free_Num}
